drivers.name: epsonepl
drivers.comments:
The printers of Epson's EPL "L" series do not understand PCL 5e, PCL 6, or PostScript and so they do not work with standard drivers; they can only be driven through a proprietary language.

An independent driver was developed in the epsonepl project.

The driver is IJS-based, GNU Ghostscript 6.53 onwards, AFPL Ghostscript 7.04 onwards, or ESP Ghostscript 7.x onwards is required.

This project is not endorsed by nor affiliated with Epson.

This driver is reported to work both on the parallel and on the USB port.

Foomatic data to generate the PPD files is included with the driver, therefore we do not provide this data and PPDs here on the OpenPrinting site,

notes:
Known not to use a standard protocol as PostScript or PCL; not to be confused with the EPL-6100.

Dr H. T. Leung and Roberto Ragusa have developed a driver; based on reverse-engineering of the printer's protocol.

The printer has parallel and USB connectors.

This printer probably works with this driver but was not fully tested yet. Any test report is welcome.

Consumables/Refills: Separate photoconductor drum and toner cartridge
